section.heading: Scope.
section.text: These regulations govern all those licensed or applying for licensure by the Board, or registering as a psychology associate.

section.heading: Fees.
section.text: The following fees are established by the Board:

para.text: Roster of licensed psychologists or registered psychology associates — $150.

section.heading: Refunds.
section.text: Application fees are nonrefundable. Examination fees shall be refunded if the request to cancel an examination is received in writing 2 weeks before the examination date.

section.heading: Change of Fees.
section.text: Fees are subject to change by action of the Board of Examiners of Psychologists. Licensees and applicants shall be notified of the change.

section.heading: One-Time Transitional Annual Licensure Renewal Fee.
section.text: For licensure renewal due between January 1 and March 31, 2000, a licensee whose license number is an odd number shall submit one-half of the biennial renewal fee for a 1-year license.

section.heading: Assessment for Health Care Professionals.
section.text: The Maryland Health Care Commission (MHCC) assesses a fee for health care professionals which the applicant shall pay at the time of license renewal as specified in COMAR 10.25.02.

annotations.annotation: Health Occupations Article, §§18-206, 18-207, 18-301, and 18-310, Annotated Code of Maryland
